paymentLink.termsAndConditions: By validating this step, you electronically sign the debit mandate and you authorise {merchantName} to send instructions to Swan to debit your account and you authorise Swan to debit your account in accordance with the instructions received. Any request for a refund will be dealt with in accordance with your bank's general terms and conditions.
